Title: Toshokan Sensou: Kakumei no Tsubasa
Description: ['Kasahara Iku and Dojo Atsushi receive an emergency recall in the middle of their date as Japan is rocked by a terror attack. Their new duty is a protection detail assigned to Touma Kurato, an author. Meanwhile, the relationship between Librarians and the Media Purity Committee is also worsening. ']
Characters: ['Doujou, Atsushi', 'Kasahara, Iku', 'Shibasaki, Asako', 'Komaki, Mikihisa', 'Tezuka, Hikaru', 'Nakazawa, Marie', 'Tezuka, Satoshi', 'Inamine, Kazuichi', 'Orikuchi, Maki', 'Genda, Ryuusuke']
